comments.author: ronald.rojas@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.16 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/10.0.648.119 Safari/534.16
Build Identifier: Firefox 4.0b12

F5 Firepass SSL VPN extension is not anymore working. It used to work before on version 3.6

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Login to company's firepass login page
2. Click on SSL VPN to install extension (installer is not showing anymore)
3.
Actual Results:  
firefox extension for F5 firepass VPN is not installing

Expected Results:  
On the initial use, firepass extension will install and on the succeeding usage the SSL VPN extension will run and execute

comments.text: This is most likely an issue with the extension itself (must be updated) but can you point me to the extension ?
comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.raw_text: This is most likely an issue with the extension itself (must be updated) but can you point me to the extension ?

comments.text: The extension is called F5 Networks Host Plugin. It just automatically installed when I login to our F5 firepass web.
